lines.text: declare characters called a , b , c and d
read a , b , c and d
create long long ans with value = max of abs ( a - c ) and abs ( b - d )
lines.code: long long ans = max ( abs ( a - c ) , abs ( b - d ) ) ;

lines.text: print ans and a new line
if a is equal to c or b is equal to d
lines.code: if ( ( a == c ) && ( b == d ) ) break ;

lines.text: if a is less than c
else if a is greater than c
if b is greater than d
else if b is less than d
